mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND pw = #{pw}
SELECT s.stud_no, s.stud_nm, s.real_stud_no, u.email, s.mbr_telno, d.C_NMK, s.ST FROM STUD_INFO s JOIN USERS u ON s.stud_no = u.user_no JOIN DEPT_CD d ON s.c_cd = d.c_cd WHERE u.user_no = #{userNo}
SELECT s.PF_TELNO, s.PF_CS_PART, s.PF_CS_PART_DETAIL, s.PF_PLC_NM, s.C_CD, s.PF_SC_PART,s.PF_NO FROM PROFESSER s JOIN USERS u ON s.PF_NO = u.user_no WHERE u.user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT s.CSL_DETAIL, s.C_CD, s.USER_NO, s.CAREER, s.CSLOR_NM, s.TEL_NO, s.CSL_LOC, s.NON_FACE, s.ONLINE, s.CHAT, s.ISRT_TIME, s.ISRT_IP, s.UPT_TIME, s.UDP_IP, s.DEL, s.DEL_IP FROM COUNSELOR s JOIN USERS u ON s.USER_NO = u.user_no WHERE u.user_no = #{userNo}
